item.title: Mother of All Dandelions (MOAD)
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Spent a few hours on Sunday cleaning the decks and weeding the back yard as Troy mowed. I don't know what it is about the soil out here, but the dandelions are HUGE. Flower/seed stems are at least a foot tall and the plants (not weeds, full-on plants) are more than a foot in diameter. Satisfying to kill.
